summary:
An enb that enhances the graphics of Vanilla Skyrim while staying close to the look of the original.
Performance friendly, lightweight enb.
descriptionHtml:
When game developers create graphics, they are focused on three things: quality, balance and gameplay. The original Skyrim graphics did a good job on
this. It was quite balanced.

At least I never was tired of seeing a particular effect or color. And it was not affecting the gameplay (for example beeing blinded by a torch or beeing blind in a dungeon)

With this enb, the graphics keep the balance and gameplay of the original, while boosting the fancyness with some post processing effects.


Nights seem to be bright, but they´re actually as bright as vanilla skyrim.


[b]Installation
[/b]download the [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0132.htm]0.132 binaries from enbdev[dot]com
[/url]and take the d3d9.dll file from the "wrapper" folder.
Drop it in the Skyrim main folder
Do the same with the preset files.
author: LaBeatBeatbox
